* Zyber sighed as she watched the Maximal head towards his base, she hoped that he was well enough to make it all the way back without complications. She then waved slightly towards him.*

" Farewell!"

*She then lowered her arm and looked at the small stream but walked over to it, she bent and picked up the bowl then began to head towards Rowdy's cave. Thinking a silent prayer of luck for the departing Maximal.
Zyber entered the cave and walked over to the ruffled furs that Striker had being laying in only moments before, she put the bowl away and then collected the soiled furs in which Striker had spilled mech-fluid on.
She looked over to Rowdy, not an expression written on her face.*

" I will wash these for you."

* With that she began to head towards the cave's exit, the furs dangling from her arms.*
